| Gen 0. | The original: Original design from 2010. Some boards shipped in 2022 due to shortage
| Gen 1. | More channels: Main version produced by OEPS from 2016 until Dec 2022.

| Gen 0. | The original: One on the main board and one on the FPGA module.
| Gen 1. | More channels: One on the main board and one on the FPGA module.
| Gen 2. | FPGA reborn: Only one on the FPGA module.
| Gen 3. | Now in 3D: Only one on the FPGA module.
